Futures and Options

Futures and Options are the two major types of stock derivatives in a share market. This module is designed to test candidate’s knowledge and understanding of the Futures and Options in the ASEAN region.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Critically evaluate the concepts and structure of the futures and options markets. [Knowledge and Understanding, Learning, Problem Solving]

+  Critically appraise all contracts including strategies such as hedging, arbitrage and speculation. [Knowledge and Understanding, Application, Enquiry]

+  Appraise options including valuation pricing models and trading strategies including pay-off diagrams. [Analysis, Problem Solving, Enquiry]

+  Demonstrate a practical understanding of Market analysis - fundamental and technical analysis of futures market. [Application, Communication]
